html.p: This dashboard and these panels extract device information for a specific location for all users.

chart.title: Device Summary for $location$
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="*" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | rename EndPointMatchedProfile AS "Endpoint Matched Profile"

table.title: Device Count Break Down
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="*" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | sort -count | `format_field_names`

chart.title: Operational View by Device for Wired Users
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Ethernet" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | rename EndPointMatchedProfile AS "Endpoint Matched Profile"

table.title: Device Details for Wired Users
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Ethernet" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile UserName EndPointMACAddress Framed_IP_Address | sort -count | `format_field_names`

chart.title: Operational View by Device for Wireless Users
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile | rename EndPointMatchedProfile AS "Endpoint Matched Profile"

table.title: Device Details for Wireless Users
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile UserName EndPointMACAddress Calling_Station_ID Called_Station_ID | sort -count | `format_field_names`

table.title: Device Count Break Down by Wired Users
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Ethernet" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile UserName NAS_Port_Type EndPointMACAddress Framed_IP_Address NetworkDeviceName NAS_Port NAS_Port_Id IdentityGroup SelectedAuthorizationProfiles AuthorizationPolicyMatchedRule AuthenticationIdentityStore | `format_field_names`

table.title: Device Count Break Down by Wireless Users
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by EndPointMatchedProfile UserName NAS_Port_Type EndPointMACAddress Calling_Station_ID Called_Station_ID NAS_Identifier Airespace_Wlan_Id Type NetworkDeviceName IdentityGroup AuthorizationPolicyMatchedRule | `format_field_names`
